MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH10 postcode area of Edinburgh, affecting properties in Greenbank Drive and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have located a faulty pillar on Greenbank drive & have started excavations to restore your supply however  due to difficult digging conditions on site we now expect your supply to be restored by 3pm. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:01pm on the 12th of January 2021.
